name: website-transform-task
description: Apply XDT transforms on XML files
author: Guillaume Rouchon / Luuk Sommers

inputs.name: workingFolder
inputs.label: Working folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory for relative paths. Defaults to the agent working directory.

inputs.name: transforms
inputs.label: Transformations
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Absolute or relative comma or newline-separated of transformation file rules.
Syntax: {xdt path} => {xml path}[ => {output path}]
Example: 'web.release.config => web.config' will apply web.release.config to web.config and update the file.
Example: 'xdt\web.release.config => config\web.config => web.config' will apply xdt\web.release.config to config\web.config and save the result in web.config.
